org.anarres.qemu.image

Class QEmuImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.qemu.image.QEmuImage

  • public class QEmuImage
extends Object
    An abstraction around a QEmu image. The underlying image file may or may not exist; this class allows for simple creation, inspection and deletion.

    • Constructor Summary

      QEmuImage(File file) 
      QEmuImage(String path)

      • create

        public void create(@Nonnull
                   QEmuImageFormat format,
                   @Nonnull
                   File backingFile)
            throws IOException
        Creates this image. backingFile is referenced by a relative path. If you want it referenced absolutely, canonicalize the argument with File.getAbsoluteFile() before calling this method.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • delete

        public void delete()
            throws IOException
        Deletes the file underlying this image, if it exists.
